channel.title: What is this?
channel.description:
Well I managed to tunnel into a very large cave, I have been exploring it for about 35 minutes now and I came across this [URL=http://host-me.info/?pm=13129424323214][IMG]http://host-me.info/?dm=13129424323214[/img][/URL]
Anyone got any ideas what that is? In the chests was food & bars.

item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The interesting box, as it was stated, is a mob spawner. It will keep spawning enemies unless you surround it with torches.

The chests can contain rare items not obtainable any other way

Read full topic

item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

It’s a mob spawner, which comes equipped with every “Dungeon”, along with mossy cobblestone and 2 big chests. The chests commonly contain saddles, bread, and redstone. You cannot collect it, but you can keep and place one by using an inventory editor or the server’s /give command.

Read full topic

item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“cane, post:6, topic:376980”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=472899.msg3458325#msg3458325 date=1294243759]

It’s a mob spawner…

Thats what the cage is lol

The entire room is considered a dungeon
[/quote]
So if I put stone around that with a few glass box for windows I would see some mobs when it goes night time?[/quote]

Not directly around the cage of course, but yes you could. Up to 5 of whatever monster it is will spawn at a time, and I don’t know the exact time between spawns, but I think its around a minute

Read full topic

item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

That’s a dungeon. Dungeons have chests in them that contain items for your taking as a reward.

The best thing to do with a dungeon it to make it into a trap that kills mobs as they spawn. If you want help I can sign in and go with you. But in a nutshell what I usually do is dig out the ground around the spawner (cage), make it pretty deep, build one wall of the pit in glass, and leave the very bottom row of blocks in this glass wall as empty. Then place blocks of water all around the ceiling of the pit causing it to fill with water. Now when the mobs spawn they will be drowned and when their items drop, the water will push all the drops out through that empty bottom row in the glass wall. You make a little spot for a person to stand, and they can just sit there while tons of feathers, string etc are collected.

Read full topic
